Package org.eclipse.mosaic.lib.util.gson

Class TimeFieldAdapter<N extends Number>

java.lang.Object
com.google.gson.TypeAdapter<N>
org.eclipse.mosaic.lib.util.gson.TimeFieldAdapter<N>
public abstract class TimeFieldAdapter<N extends Number> extends com.google.gson.TypeAdapter<N>
Adapter for JSON fields which translates values as string representatives to actual long values (nanoseconds), e.g. "10 ms" -> 10_000_000, "20 ns" -> 20, "0.5h" -> 1_800_000_000_000

Usage: 

 @JsonAdapter(TimeFieldAdapter.NanoSeconds.class)
 public long startTime;
